title: Orange and pomegranate salad
ingredients: ['80ml olive oil', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch dried sage, or to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1 tablespoon orange juice, or to taste', '275g mixed baby salad greens', '150g pomegranate, peeled and seeds separated', '1 orange, peeled and cut into bite-size pieces']
